ns0:entry.ns0:title: Azure/AzureLocal-Supportability
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/Azure/AzureLocal-Supportability
Language: powershell
Welcome to the Azure Local Supportability Forum! This is where the Azure Local team will track troubleshooting guides and issues with Azure Local. We will maintain this repo in order to provide a central location for community driven supportability content.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: Azure/Microsoft-Defender-for-Cloud
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/Azure/Microsoft-Defender-for-Cloud
Language: powershell
Welcome to the Microsoft Defender for Cloud community repository

ns0:entry.ns0:title: ChrisTitusTech/winutil
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/ChrisTitusTech/winutil
Language: powershell
Chris Titus Tech's Windows Utility - Install Programs, Tweaks, Fixes, and Updates

ns0:entry.ns0:title: I-Am-Jakoby/PowerShell-for-Hackers
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/I-Am-Jakoby/PowerShell-for-Hackers
Language: powershell
This repository is a collection of powershell functions every hacker should know

ns0:entry.ns0:title: Micke-K/IntuneManagement
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/Micke-K/IntuneManagement
Language: powershell
Copy, export, import, delete, document and compare policies and profiles in Intune and Azure with PowerShell script and WPF UI. Import ADMX files and registry settings with ADMX ingestion. View and edit PowerShell script.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: Raphire/Win11Debloat
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/Raphire/Win11Debloat
Language: powershell
A simple, easy to use PowerShell script to remove pre-installed apps, disable telemetry, as well as perform various other changes to customize, declutter and improve your Windows experience. Win11Debloat works for both Windows 10 and Windows 11.

ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/cisagov/ScubaGear

Automation to assess the state of your M365 tenant against CISA's baselines

ns0:entry.ns0:title: microsoft/Agents
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/microsoft/Agents
Language: powershell
The Microsoft 365 Agent SDK simplifies building full stack, multichannel, trusted agents for platforms including M365, Teams, Copilot Studio, and Webchat.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: microsoftgraph/powershell-intune-samples
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/microsoftgraph/powershell-intune-samples
Language: powershell
This repository of PowerShell sample scripts show how to access Intune service resources. They demonstrate this by making HTTPS RESTful API requests to the Microsoft Graph API from PowerShell.
